summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the correctness of batching transformations across a wide range of numerical operations, including linear algebra, convolution, indexing, collective communication, and automatic differentiation, ensuring that batched functions behave as expected in both forward and reverse modes.
business_intent: Provide robust regression testing for developers of a numerical computing library to guarantee that batching (vmap) and related transformations produce accurate results, maintain gradient fidelity, and handle edge cases across diverse primitives.
